original_text: They honored us in many ways; and when we were ready to sail, they furnished us with the supplies we needed.
korean_text: 후한 예로 우리를 대접하고 떠날 때에 우리 쓸 것을 배에 실었더라

sentences.original_text: They honored us in many ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 가지 방법으로 우리를 존경했습니다

sentences.original_text: when we were ready to sail
they furnished us with the supplies we needed
